A token for mourners, or, The advice of Christ to a distressed mother bewailing the death of her dear and only son wherein the boundaries of sorrow are duly fixed, excesses restrained, the common pleas answered, and divers rules for the support of Gods afflicted ones prescribed / by J.F. Flavel, John, 1630?-1691.
[10], 159 p.
Printed for Robert Boulter, London : 1674.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
=======
